title: PVP.net not responging why?
body:
Pvp.net is not responding and can't Launch the game help please
{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
PvP.net Patcher Kernel errors are typically caused by League missing specific permissions it needs to run. League interacts and relies on a lot of files outside of the League folder, so it needs admin privileges to do so. I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if your issue persists through those configurations.
